res_img_laws_deepfake.title: Posible a Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_img_laws_deepfake.content: No dagiti ladawan ket digitally produced, inedit, wenno doctored, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_img_laws_safe_spaces.title: Posible a Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_img_laws_safe_spaces.content: No dagiti ladawan wenno video ket nakababa-in, defamatory, wenno mangipangpangta, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Safe Spaces Act.

res_img_laws_privacy.title: Posible a Violation: Data Privacy Act
res_img_laws_privacy.content: No dagiti ladawan wenno video ket agus-usar ti identidadmo tapno i-impersonate naka, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Data Privacy Act.

res_img_laws_voyeur.title: Posible a Violation: Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act
res_img_laws_voyeur.content: No dagiti ladawan wenno video ket naala a sekreto wenno awan pammalubosmo, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act.

res_img_laws_intimate.title: Posible a Violation: Safe Spaces / Voyeurism
res_img_laws_intimate.content: No dagiti ladawan ket naglaon ti intimate wenno explicit materials, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Safe Spaces Act, Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act, ken dadduma pay a special protections.

res_img_laws_minor.title: Posible a Violation: Anti-OSAEC / Anti-Child Abuse
res_img_laws_minor.content: No dagiti ladawan ket naglaon ti minors (ub-ubbing ngem 18), mabalin a violation daytoy ti Anti-OSAEC Law, Anti-Child Abuse Law, ken adda karbengam kadagiti special protections.

res_imp_action.title: I-report ti Impersonation
res_imp_action.content: Kasla masapulmo a solbaren daytoy direkta iti platform wenno iti tao a maseknan. Matulongandaka nga agsagana ti formal complaint base iti impormasyon nga intedmo, wenno ikonektadaka kadagiti dadduma a resources.

res_imp_security.title: I-secure dagiti Accounts-mo
res_imp_security.content: No ti login information-mo ket na-expose, pangngaasi ta sukatam dagus dagiti password-mo ken i-enable ti Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) kadagiti amin nga accounts.

res_harass_cyber.title: Posible a Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_harass_cyber.content: Ti harassment/pangta ket nairaman ti maulit-ulit ken di kayat a contact babaen ti digital means. Mabalin a violation daytoy ti Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_harass_threats.title: Posible a Violation: Grave Threats (Article 282)
res_harass_threats.content: No ti harassment ket nairaman ti pangta ti pisikal, reputational, wenno financial harm, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Article 282 (Grave Threats).

res_harass_safe_spaces.title: Posible a Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_harass_safe_spaces.content: No ti harassment ket naiturong iti babai ken/wenno ubing, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Safe Spaces Act.

res_harass_vawc.title: Posible a Violation: Anti-VAWC Laws
res_harass_vawc.content: No ti harassment ket naggapu iti current wenno former intimate partner, mabalin a violation daytoy ti Anti-VAWC Laws (RA 9262).

res_dox_npc.title: Data Privacy Violation
res_dox_npc.content: Kasla ti mapaspasaram ket maysa a violation ti Data Privacy Act (RA 10173). Matulongandaka a mag-draft ti formal complaint.

res_dox_offline.title: Offline/Other Violation
res_dox_offline.content: No saan a napasamak daytoy babaen ti computer system, baka saan a violation ti Data Privacy Act, ngem posible pay laeng nga illegal. Consult legal counsel.
